item.title: Pentagon takes big stake in new Korea Zinc smelter in Tennessee, will get 10% of company
item.description: The U.S. government is ramping up its investment in critical minerals partnerships not reliant on China.

item.title: Former Instacart employee says she was fired over her Democratic congressional campaign
item.description: The fired employee's lawyers say Instacart's actions align with how corporate America has sought to curry favor with the Trump administration.

item.title: Ukraine peace talks progressing, Russia open to EU membership, U.S. officials say
item.description: The war in Ukraine began nearly four years ago, when Russia invaded at the direction of its leader, Vladimir Putin.
